description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) pursuant to planning permission dated 23/04/2021 ref  2021/0199 (Alterations including erection of roof extension to create additional storey of habitable accommodation and first floor rear extension in connection with conversion into 2 x 1-bedroom, and 1 x studio flats.) to allow the retention of the mansard roof level as built.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - By reason of its design, scale and prominent location, the design of the proposed amended front roof pitch would cause unacceptable harm to the character of the application property, would appear incongruous within the street scene and would be contrary to the principles of good design. The variation of condition 2 would therefore be contrary to policies LP1 and LP5 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (2023), as well as the guidance of the Council's Housing SPD (2016).

Reason : 2 - The removal of the front roof terrace would result in the loss of private amenity space and cycle parking space for the occupiers of the second floor flat to the harm of the standard of accommodation and sustainable transport. The variation of condition 2 would therefore be contrary to policies LP27 and LP51 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (2023).
